message.entry: Simulate SLAM app interactive workflows. Take screenshots (shown in the Expected column) and save sessions at various checkpoints along the process. Then reload saved sessions one by one and verify the screenshots after each reload (shown in the Actual column) are consistent with their counterparts in the Expected column.
use TF, start time at {0, number, integer}, end time at {1, number, integer}, downsample to {2, number, integer} percent, finally move the scan slider scrubber to {3, number, integer}
Import a bag, change some settings ({0}), don't click the "Apply" button yet
Then click the "Apply" button to apply the changed settings
Close the importer tab and getting ready for map building
Then click the "Run" button to start map building, pause when it processes to scan {0}
Now click the "Step to previous loop closure" button in the loop closure figure
Click the "Loop Closure" button in the "Manual Modification" section to enter the modification tab
Click the "Ignore" button to ignore current loop closure
Confirm the current loop closure is ignored by clicking the "Accept" button
The workspace importer tab should be in pristine state.
Data has been put in base workspace. The workspace importer tab is refreshed and the scans and poses dropdowns should be populated.
Scans, Poses and downsample percentage have been selected and the scans and odometry previews have been rendered in the corresponding figure documents.
